respecting copyright laws tail fins flatten the end of the tail with the last single_crochet of r 77 in the middle looking down the body of the reaper to see if the stitch lines up with the center of the reaper see photos a if the stitch is off center by a little bit you can single_crochet a few stitches to correct this before making the tail fins as we want the tail fins to be perpendicular to the body of the reaper and not twisted oddly you should still have 24 stitches skip 12 st single_crochet into the 13th st place marker the tail should be split in half with 12 st on one side and 12 st on the other side see photos b ignore the 12 skipped stitches for now 12 sts r 12 decrease single_crochet 8 9 r 1 single_crochet 4 increase x2 single_crochet 4 decrease 13 r 13 r 14 single_crochet 9 9
